channel.title: I dont think We Can Do Pures Anymore
channel.description: Well, i got a pure ranger account on RuneScape and every 2 lvls of range i lvl up in i go up a total lvl. so i was lvl 13 with 16 range. Now im lvl 14 with 18 range, i thought pures were suppose to be very low lvls with very high things like mage and range? This is my first pure, so if im missing something plz lemme know.

item.title: I dont think We Can Do Pures Anymore
item.dc:creator: @O_M_F_G O M F G
item.description:
@O_M_F_G wrote:

I got a noob pure mage, barely played on it. Here are the stats:
22cb ; 33mage ; 21hp ; 2def ; 9pray ; 30something cooking and fishing ; 5mining ; 6smithing ; 3woodcutting ; 3 firemaking ; 1everything else ;
I do have a main, and as I said I hardly played on this acount…My main is mainly comabat, I would buy a cannon and get my range up from 40 to at least 50, but I’m too lazy to carry the instruction book and the cannon ball mould over to the dwarf general guy, although I pass him nearly every other day…I wasted loads of cash on useless items like dragy stuff, pirate hat, changing how my hair looks a couple times every day that I play(fine, I only changed it twice), absolutely useless, yet fair priced pirate hats, ect. …

Read full topic
item.source: I dont think We Can Do Pures Anymore

item.title: I dont think We Can Do Pures Anymore
item.dc:creator: @frank frank_
item.description:
@frank wrote:

[quote=“Erj, post:10, topic:23160”][quote author=frank_ link=topic=35307.msg422377#msg422377 date=1163006677]
pures in rs2 are crap, the idea nowadays is to make it a hybrid, range/mage, range/melee or mage/melee
[/quote]
RSC pkers are the best. Plate pures, prayerbeast, 1-40 def pures. Very legit[/quote]yea, nothing can compare with a RSC pure, especially if it has ranged

Read full topic

pures in rs2 are crap, the idea nowadays is to make it a hybrid, range/mage, range/melee or mage/melee

RSC pkers are the best. Plate pures, prayerbeast, 1-40 def pures. Very legit

item.title: I dont think We Can Do Pures Anymore
item.dc:creator: @Time Time
item.description:
@Time wrote:

best hybrid is high range high melee,

e.g wearing bow you hit 12 2h potted you hit 18…

if accurate you’l hit 12 and 18 = 30 in 1 sec.

good for ko.
